sandals.title: Classic Slide Sandals
sandals.subtitle: Nike Victori One
sandals.intro: For when you want to feel like you're walking on athletic clouds, but also let everyone know you just came from the gym (or want them to think you did).
sandals.desc: Black slide sandals with a cushioned footbed and textured sole. Features the iconic swoosh logo and a wide, comfortable strap design perfect for post-workout recovery or casual wear.

sandals.title: Performance Flip-Flops
sandals.subtitle: Athletic Thong Sandals
sandals.intro: Because sometimes your feet need the structural support of a hiking boot, but in flip-flop form. Yes, that's a thing now.
sandals.desc: Gray athletic flip-flops with an ergonomic footbed and aggressive tread pattern. Built with arch support and durable construction for active lifestyles, featuring a sporty design with black accents.

sandals.title: Casual Fabric Flip-Flops
sandals.subtitle: Canvas Thong Sandals
sandals.intro: The burgundy rebels of the flip-flop world—soft, sophisticated, and proof that beach shoes can have a personality.
sandals.desc: Burgundy red flip-flops with a soft fabric footbed and woven textile straps. Handcrafted appearance with visible stitching around the edges, combining comfort with a unique casual style.

sandals.title: Cozy Knit Slippers
sandals.subtitle: Sherpa-Lined House Shoes
sandals.intro: It's like wrapping your feet in a warm hug from a very stylish sweater. Winter feet have never been this bougie.
sandals.desc: Navy blue cable-knit slippers with plush white sherpa lining. Features a closed-toe design with comfortable cushioning and indoor/outdoor soles, perfect for keeping feet warm during cold months.

sandals.title: Minimalist Logo Slippers
sandals.subtitle: Designer House Slides
sandals.intro: When you want to casually flex your designer taste while shuffling to the kitchen for midnight snacks.
sandals.desc: Light gray slip-on slippers with subtle branding. Clean, minimalist design with a comfortable fit and dark contrasting trim, ideal for indoor lounging with an understated luxury aesthetic.

sandals.title: Quilted Comfort Slippers
sandals.subtitle: Plush Memory Foam House Shoes
sandals.intro: These coral cuties are basically tiny pillows for your feet—with a 'HOME' label in case your feet forget where they live.
sandals.desc: Coral pink quilted slippers with luxurious white fleece lining. Features diamond-pattern stitching, memory foam cushioning, and a 'HOME' emblem, combining warmth and comfort with a cozy, homey design.
